The first is when the land is pure and complete.
It's the stage of cultivation.
That's why the previous commentary said.

source_sentence: 此教二地已上諸大菩薩。
translation: 'This teaches the great bodhisattvas above the second ground.'
○From the point at which the wisdom of the unsurpassed view is purified and fulfilled downward.
They're all at the final stage.'
That's why the preceding commentary says.
"Here, the following are only the fruit of Buddhahood.
[Commentary] Here, of the eighteen abodes, the first fourteen are accumulations.
The first fourteen are accumulations ...
Fifteen and sixteen are preparatory practices.
17 are the path of seeing.
Of the eighteen, the first one is complete cultivation.
The rest are the path of no more training.
[Commentary] After the hanging judgment.

source_sentence: 金剛經疏記科會卷第三
translation: Jingang jing shouji kehui vol. 3
